body:
Added some debugging of the funnel
```
Initial: IPv4 407890, IPv6 56492, Onion 715
Skip entries with valid address: IPv4 407890, IPv6 56492, Onion 715
Skip entries from suspicious hosts: IPv4 407889, IPv6 56492, Onion 715
Enforce minimal number of blocks: IPv4 104845, IPv6 48821, Onion 617
Require service bit 1: IPv4 104650, IPv6 48759, Onion 607
Require at least 50% 30-day uptime: IPv4 4961, IPv6 966, Onion 19
Require a known and recent user agent: IPv4 3408, IPv6 628, Onion 2
Filter out hosts with multiple bitcoin ports: IPv4 3402, IPv6 624, Onion 2
ERR: Could not resolve ASN for "91.195.42.134"
ERR: Could not resolve ASN for "150.187.36.233"
Look up ASNs and limit results, both per ASN and globally: IPv4 512, IPv6 624, Onion 2
```

These are the onion-killers:
- Require at least 50% 30-day uptime
- Require a known and recent user agent
